Mark is an exceptionally thoughtful engineer.  In our two years working together, I frequently saw him deliver where others struggled, writing elegant, well-designed, and easily maintained code and quickly pinpointing tricky race conditions that were causing strange behaviors.  He truly excels in the UI space, but never hesitated to jump outside of his area of expertise as well.  Not only does he consider all the technical aspects when tackling a problem, but he also susses out the product and business needs to make sure that he's delivering towards the real end goal.Mark is also a true leader, leading by example through his excellent work and dedication, setting a standard that everyone working with him strives to match.  With unusually low ego for someone at his level, he is a joy to work with, generously taking time to share his knowledge while remaining open to input and new ideas, eager to continue to level up.  I would jump at the opportunity to work with Mark again!

Claire is a data science unicorn, with strong data science and NLP knowledge, solid engineering skills, a bias towards action, and the ability to explain deeply technical concepts in an understandable way to anyone in the company. She has a wealth of knowledge, picks up new subjects with ease, and is a pleasure to work with.One outstanding contribution of many during our two years working together consisted of a novel approach to content relevance ranking. She developed the prototype independently, and her design intentionally enabled the system to be implemented with low engineering effort, while maintaining user privacy and prediction accuracy.I highly recommend Claire for any team in search of a needle moving data scientist!
